wpa_handshake.description: Captures WPA/WPA2 handshake for offline cracking
wpa_handshake.requirements: Monitor mode, aircrack-ng suite, active clients
wpa_handshake.detection: Difficulty depends on network traffic; needs active clients to capture handshake
wpa_handshake.mitigation: Strong passwords (12+ random chars), WPA3 when available, 802.11w PMF

wps_pixie_dust.description: Attacks WPS implementation flaws to recover PIN without brute force
wps_pixie_dust.requirements: Monitor mode, reaver or bully tools, vulnerable router
wps_pixie_dust.detection: Quick attack against vulnerable routers with weak WPS implementations
wps_pixie_dust.mitigation: Disable WPS or update router firmware, use router with patched WPS implementation

wps_brute_force.description: Tries all possible WPS PIN combinations until successful
wps_brute_force.requirements: Monitor mode, reaver tool, patience (can take hours/days)
wps_brute_force.detection: Slow attack that attempts PIN combinations sequentially
wps_brute_force.mitigation: Disable WPS, enable rate limiting, use router with patched WPS implementation

wep_attack.description: Captures and analyzes WEP encrypted packets to recover the key
wep_attack.requirements: Monitor mode, aircrack-ng suite, packet injection capability
wep_attack.detection: Relatively quick attack requiring capture of sufficient IVs
wep_attack.mitigation: Upgrade to WPA2/WPA3, WEP is fundamentally broken

deauthentication.description: Sends deauthentication frames to disconnect clients from network
deauthentication.requirements: Monitor mode, aireplay-ng, packet injection capability
deauthentication.detection: Very quick attack that disturbs network connectivity
deauthentication.mitigation: Enable 802.11w Protected Management Frames (PMF), which prevents unauthenticated deauth frames

jamming.description: Disrupts wireless network communication by generating interference
jamming.requirements: Monitor mode, specialized tools, packet injection capability
jamming.detection: Continuous attack that prevents normal network operation
jamming.mitigation: Physical security, RF shielding, detect and locate jamming sources

wpa_dictionary.description: Uses wordlists to crack captured WPA handshakes
wpa_dictionary.requirements: Captured handshake, CPU/GPU for cracking, wordlists
wpa_dictionary.detection: Offline attack after handshake capture, speed depends on hardware
wpa_dictionary.mitigation: Use strong random passwords not found in dictionaries

wpa_rule_based.description: Uses password patterns and rules to generate candidates for cracking
wpa_rule_based.requirements: Captured handshake, CPU/GPU for cracking, hashcat rules
wpa_rule_based.detection: Offline attack that tests patterns based on rules
wpa_rule_based.mitigation: Avoid predictable password patterns or modifications

wpa_mask_attack.description: Uses custom pattern masks to generate password candidates
wpa_mask_attack.requirements: Captured handshake, CPU/GPU for cracking, hashcat mask syntax
wpa_mask_attack.detection: Offline attack that generates passwords based on specified patterns
wpa_mask_attack.mitigation: Use passwords that don't follow common patterns (like dates or keyboard sequences)

krack_attack.description: Key Reinstallation Attack against WPA2 implementation flaws
krack_attack.requirements: Specialized tools, vulnerable targets, man-in-the-middle position
krack_attack.detection: Exploits flaw in WPA2 to potentially decrypt traffic
krack_attack.mitigation: Apply firmware updates to clients and access points

rogue_ap.description: Creates fake access point to capture credentials or traffic
rogue_ap.requirements: Two wireless interfaces, dhcp server, web server for captive portal
rogue_ap.detection: Creates deceptive network to lure clients into connecting
rogue_ap.mitigation: Verify network authenticity, use VPN, enable EAP authentication

pmkid_attack.description: Extracts PMKID from access point for offline cracking without clients
pmkid_attack.requirements: Monitor mode, hcxdumptool, vulnerable access point
pmkid_attack.detection: Quicker alternative to handshake capture that doesn't require clients
pmkid_attack.mitigation: Strong WPA2/WPA3 passwords, disable roaming features when not needed

fragmentation_attack.description: Exploits frame aggregation and fragmentation flaws in WiFi
fragmentation_attack.requirements: Monitor mode, specialized tools for frame manipulation
fragmentation_attack.detection: Complex attack that targets WiFi frame processing implementation flaws
fragmentation_attack.mitigation: Apply firmware updates to patch FragAttacks vulnerabilities

karma_attack.description: Exploits clients that probe for previously connected networks
karma_attack.requirements: Wireless adapter supporting hostapd or specialized rogue AP tools
karma_attack.detection: Responds to client probe requests by impersonating networks clients are looking for
karma_attack.mitigation: Don't auto-connect to networks, disable probe requests for saved networks when not in use

wps_offline_pin.description: Calculates WPS PIN based on access point information
wps_offline_pin.requirements: Knowledge of router model and algorithm vulnerabilities
wps_offline_pin.detection: Offline attack that computes probable PINs based on predictable generation algorithms
wps_offline_pin.mitigation: Disable WPS, use router with randomized PIN generation

owe_downgrade.description: Forces downgrade from Opportunistic Wireless Encryption to open network
owe_downgrade.requirements: Monitor mode, specialized tools, man-in-the-middle position
owe_downgrade.detection: Downgrades connection security by manipulating management frames
owe_downgrade.mitigation: Use fully authenticated encryption (WPA2/WPA3) instead of OWE
